title: Phase 1: Core Engine
description:
Minimal viable Ralph runner with feature parity to ralph-ticker bash script.

Claude Code only, no TUI, no worktrees - just a solid Go foundation.

Exit criteria: Can complete an epic autonomously, equivalent to ralph-ticker.sh

See SPEC.md ## Roadmap > Phase 1 for full details.
